Tucson narrows his optics to concentrate on the source of the disturbance h=
e had first detected.  There were thermal readings that were fluxuating tha=
t indicated movement.  He frowns at the thought of having to be ambushed.  =
A low growl escapes his throat, and clenched fang like teeth become apparen=
t on his face.  He was ready to fight if need be.

" Careful, not too fast,=
 everyone.  There is definitely movement of the sentient kind."
